choice.tip: Wrong. Both A and B are correct

choice.title: class manager extends salary {}
choice.tip: Wrong.Interfaces are implemented in a class through implements keyword

choice.title: class manager implements salary {}
choice.tip: Correct. Interfaces are implemented in a class through implements keyword
